rows.label: qst200224_msg0001
rows.name:
But of course it can buy happiness.
Money is money, dirty or otherwise.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0002
rows.name:
And with enough money, you can
solve any problem!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0003
rows.name: You...!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0028
rows.name: It's been a while, my dear Glen.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0029
rows.name:
Oh, I get it now. So you were the one
who led this poor girl astray.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes, I showed her a way forward.
But "leading astray"? I don't think so.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0005
rows.name:
I only advised her to follow
what was in her heart.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0006
rows.name:
Money is what she needs to turn her
life around! It is her salvation!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0007
rows.name: Money is salvation?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0008
rows.name:
That's right, Glen.
You can't save anyone with your
precious "justice" alone.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0009
rows.name:
Because greed is the foundation
of humanity!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0010
rows.name:
Given the chance, all humans would
sacrifice others to fulfill the greed
that lurks in their hearts!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0011
rows.name:
To follow one's own desires and do
whatever it takes to fulfill them...
That is the path to salvation!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0012
rows.name:
I've had enough of your nonsense!
That's not salvation, it's madness!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0013
rows.name:
Every person has the potential
to live a proud and just life, even
without money!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, I'd love to stay here and debate
all day, but I must dash. There's a big
event about to go down in Teos Aure.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0015
rows.name:
In Teos Aure?
What are you plotting this time?!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0016
rows.name:
Oh, nothing much. I just fed a little
Bolla Bolla to the monsters in the area.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0030
rows.name:
With ten times the energy, they were
all too eager to go on a rampage.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0017
rows.name:
What?! You never said
anything about that!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0018
rows.name: What's the problem?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0019
rows.name:
This is the perfect opportunity to
advertise your new product's potency.

rows.label: qst200224_msg0020
rows.name:
Even giant monsters love the taste!
Bolla Bolla, the drink that makes you
feel like a king! On sale now!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0021
rows.name:
Trust me, it'll do wonders for
your bottom line. And isn't that
what you wanted?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0022
rows.name: I...I didn't...

rows.label: qst200224_msg0023
rows.name:
Just how far do you have to go
before you're satisfied, villain?!

rows.label: qst200224_msg0024
rows.name:
Having a little trouble keeping our
temper in check, are we, Glen?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0025
rows.name:
But do you have the time to waste
here shouting at me?

rows.label: qst200224_msg0026
rows.name:
Who knows how many people are
getting hurt in Teos Aure right now...

rows.label: qst200224_msg0027
rows.name:
Curse you! I'll deal with you later...
Don't you think you can hide from me!
